review_text: Bought for my little one with a busy brain who has trouble winding down at night - but I have also been taking it and its great. Really good deep sleep. Liquid is good for us as we can easily vary the dosage as required. Tastes great.

I tried it because it had a large capacity and the ingredients were what I was looking for. I am using 10ml and it is working mildly. I still wake up in the middle of the day, so it might be a good idea to increase the amount a little more. It's a sweet syrupy drink that leaves a bit of a tingle in your throat, but I feel like it's soothing.

Relax and sleep well. The ingredients are good, and the size could be a little bigger. If you dilute it with water and drink it, the taste becomes softer.The good thing about it is that the effect is mild, but it definitely helps you relax. I'm satisfied with the quality!

review_title: It's easy to drink and has a large capacity!
review_text: I especially like liquid products because they work quickly, even a small amount works well, and they tend to make you sleepy. Up until now, I had been purchasing melatonin in a dropper type, but when I was idly at night before going to bed, the tip of the dropper would hit my teeth or tongue and get dirty. You can rest assured that you don't have to worry about this product. The good thing about it is that it has a sweet and sour berry flavor, so it doesn't have a strong taste and is easy to drink! I love that it's large and lasts a long time.

I take 1-2.5ml with a measuring spoon. If I take too much, my body gets hot and I feel sleepy the next morning, so this amount is just right. I feel like I'm not only sleeping better, but also feeling less tired the next day. It starts working 30 minutes to an hour after taking it. Melatonin supplements alone were too strong for me, but this one is mild and very effective. I think it's because it contains other ingredients. If you find melatonin supplements too strong for you, you might want to try this one. It has a sweet taste. It's a matter of personal preference, but once I got used to it, I had no problems. I store it in the refrigerator.

I usually buy melatonin supplements in liquid form. The one I usually buy was sold out, so I bought this. This product apparently contains other ingredients besides melatonin that help you sleep better, but I don't think it works that much better than other melatonin supplements. However, the taste is unique, and even if you dilute it, it doesn't taste that good. It tastes quite artificial.

the ingredients are all those that I used separately, but in one bottle. that's great the dosage is not large, but it did not live up to expectations. may have a cumulative effect. it tastes like sweet syrup
Really super satisfied!!!! I give it to my daughters by reducing the dose to 2g and it's really incredible how it calms them down in the evening. They fall asleep easily and deeply. I recommend
Pretty much the only melatonin that works for me. Usually, pills make me itch. Liquid even works faster. I fall asleep 100% immediately with it.
I found it sweet and easy to drink, similar to the medicine I used to take as a child, but it was a pain to measure out the amount into the clear cup attached to the outside of the lid.

review_title: It seems to be working gently
review_text: I give this to my elderly father, who I care for. He used to have trouble falling asleep, but since I started giving it to him, he has gotten a lot better. However, the taste is a bit strong, so you need to be careful because he may choke.

I usually take melatonin in gummy form, but I tried the liquid form thinking it might work faster, but I didn't notice any results and it was too sweet, more than anything. I'll go back to the gummy form.

review_title: Does it depend on the person?
review_text: It doesn't feel like a supplement at all. Imagine the taste like drinking gum syrup. so sweet. The good thing about this bottle size is that you can adjust the amount you drink. It may be a hassle to wash the cap every time, but it will become unsteady after a while. I bought this because I got used to the liquid type and no longer felt the effect. You will sleep deeply and wake up refreshed in the morning. I think the quality is good. I repeated it.

I think people who take melatonin supplements can actually feel the effects. However, it is quite sweet and I personally found it difficult to take it before going to bed. A scale is included with the cap. I think it's easier to use than the dropper type because you can adjust the amount.

The bliss of drinking melatonin on the weekend and sleeping! For someone like me who dreams and erases the stress I get when I'm awake, I personally think that there are few things in life that can beat this. I like gummy and syrup types of melatonin, but this melatonin has a great flavor and effect! The name of the flavor is also Dream berry, which sounds like something out of a fairy tale like Alice in Wonderland. I'm the type of person who can have really good dreams when I drink melatonin, so if you like lucid dreaming and melatonin, I definitely want you to try it!

I took this tool because I suffered for a long time, I could not find anything. Against the backdrop of chronic stress, the quality of sleep has suffered greatly. Drinking it, I really sleep soundly, I wake up a maximum of once. I fall asleep about an hour and a half after taking it. Of the minuses: for me, a very sugary sweet taste. That's why I took off one point.
